select g.gene_id, g.name, g.genome_id, g.locus_tag, g.gene_type, g.contig_id, g.pos_from, g.pos_to, g.strand, g.product from _temp_gene g where gene_id = :id;

select tbe.name, tbe.type, tbe.barseq_experiment_id, tbgs.score_cnnls from _temp_gene g inner join _temp_barseq_gene_score tbgs on g.gene_id = tbgs.gene_id inner join _temp_barseq_experiment tbe on tbgs.barseq_experiment_id = tbe.barseq_experiment_id where g.gene_id = :id order by tbgs.score_cnnls desc;

select tbe.name, tbe.barseq_experiment_id, tbe.type, tbf.barcode, tbf.bagseq_fragment_id, tbfs.score from _temp_gene g inner join _temp_bagseq_gene_fragment_map tbgfm on g.gene_id = tbgfm.gene_id inner join _temp_bagseq_fragment tbf on tbgfm.bagseq_fragment_id = tbf.bagseq_fragment_id inner join _temp_barseq_fragment_score tbfs on tbf.bagseq_fragment_id = tbfs.bagseq_fragment_id inner join _temp_barseq_experiment tbe on tbfs.barseq_experiment_id = tbe.barseq_experiment_id where g.gene_id = :id order by tbfs.score desc;

select tbf.bagseq_fragment_id, tbf.barcode, tbfs.score from _temp_gene g inner join _temp_bagseq_gene_fragment_map tbgfm on g.gene_id = tbgfm.gene_id inner join _temp_bagseq_fragment tbf on tbf.bagseq_fragment_id = tbgfm.bagseq_fragment_id inner join _temp_barseq_fragment_score tbfs on tbf.bagseq_fragment_id = tbfs.bagseq_fragment_id where g.gene_id = :id;
